    integersListToString(List<Integer>, boolean) - Static method in class dev.bjdelacruz.commons.utils.ListUtils

    interpolate(Point<Number, Number>, Point<Number, Number>, Number) - Static method in class dev.bjdelacruz.commons.utils.math.Interpolator
    Interpolates a point using the linear interpolation formula:

    Y = left_y + ((X - left_x) * (right_y - left_y) / (right_x - left_x))

    where Y is an interpolated value at X.
    interpolate(List<Point<Number, Number>>) - Static method in class dev.bjdelacruz.commons.utils.math.Interpolator
    Interpolates all the points in the given list that are between pairs of points that contain a value for Y.
    Interpolator - Class in dev.bjdelacruz.commons.utils.math
    A utility class that contains methods for performing linear interpolation.
